TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AsyncCompletedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你使用的一个类以实现[基于事件的异步模式概述](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/event-based-asynchronous-pattern-overview.md)，则该类将提供*MethodName* `Completed`事件。If you are using a class that implements the [Event-based Asynchronous Pattern Overview](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/event-based-asynchronous-pattern-overview.md), the class will provide a *MethodName*`Completed` event. 如果你添加的实例委托到事件中，你将收到有关中的异步操作的结果的信息相应的事件处理程序方法的参数。If you add an instance of the delegate to the event, you will receive information about the outcome of asynchronous operations in the parameter of the corresponding event-handler method. 客户端应用程序的事件处理程序委托可以检查属性来确定是否取消异步任务。The client application's event-handler delegate can check the property to determine if the asynchronous task was cancelled. 客户端应用程序的事件处理程序委托可以检查属性以确定异步任务的执行过程中是否发生异常。The client application's event-handler delegate can check the property to determine if an exception occurred during execution of the asynchronous task. 如果类支持多个异步方法或对相同的异步方法的多个调用，则可以确定哪个任务引发*MethodName* `Completed`通过检查的值的事件属性。If the class supports multiple asynchronous methods, or multiple calls to the same asynchronous method, you can determine which task raised the *MethodName*`Completed` event by checking the value of the property. 你的代码将需要跟踪这些令牌，也称为作为任务 Id 及其相应的异步任务开始和完成。Your code will need to track these tokens, known as task IDs, as their corresponding asynchronous tasks start and complete. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用以跟踪异步操作的生存期。The following code example demonstrates using an to track the lifetime of asynchronous operations. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/CS/primenumbercalculatormain.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/VB/primenumbercalculatormain.vb#11)] [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/CS/primenumbercalculatormain.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/VB/primenumbercalculatormain.vb#12)]

span.para: 遵循基于事件的异步模式的类可以引发事件以向客户端的挂起的异步操作的状态。如果此类提供 * MethodName *事件时，你可以使用需要了解客户端的有关异步操作的结果。你可能想要向客户端通知有关比异步操作的结果的详细信息还包含。在这种情况下，可以派生您自己的类从类并提供附加的私有实例变量和相应的只读的公共属性。调用之前返回的属性值，该操作已取消或出错的情况下的方法。

Classes that follow the Event-based Asynchronous Pattern can raise events to alert clients about the status of pending asynchronous operations. If the class provides a *MethodName* event, you can use the to tell clients about the outcome of asynchronous operations. You may want to communicate to clients more information about the outcome of an asynchronous operation than an accommodates. In this case, you can derive your own class from the class and provide additional private instance variables and corresponding read-only public properties. Call the method before returning the property value, in case the operation was canceled or an error occurred.

span.span: if the background operation has been canceled; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性是`true`，异步操作已中断。When the property is `true`, the asynchronous operation was interrupted. 应检查客户端应用程序的事件处理程序委托之前访问的类中的任何属性的属性派生自; 否则为该属性将引发如果异步操作中断。The client application's event-handler delegate should check the property before accessing any properties in a class derived from ; otherwise, the property will raise an if the asynchronous operation was interrupted. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用以跟踪异步操作的生存期。The following code example demonstrates the using an to track the lifetime of asynchronous operations. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/CS/primenumbercalculatormain.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/VB/primenumbercalculatormain.vb#11)] [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/CS/primenumbercalculatormain.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/VB/primenumbercalculatormain.vb#12)]

span.para: 如果你提供的派生类中的只读属性，一定要调用方法。这可以防止客户端访问可能不是有效，因为异步操作中的失败发生的属性。

If you provide read-only properties in a derived class, be sure to call the method. This prevents clients from accessing properties that are potentially not valid due to a failure in the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果异步操作期间引发异常，类将分配到的异常属性。If an exception is raised during an asynchronous operation, the class will assign the exception to the property. 应检查客户端应用程序的事件处理程序委托之前访问的类中的任何属性的属性派生自; 否则为该属性将引发与其属性保存引用。The client application's event-handler delegate should check the property before accessing any properties in a class derived from ; otherwise, the property will raise a with its property holding a reference to . 值属性是`null`操作已取消的情况。The value of the property is `null` if the operation was canceled. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用以跟踪异步操作的生存期。The following code example demonstrates using an to track the lifetime of asynchronous operations. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/CS/primenumbercalculatormain.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/VB/primenumbercalculatormain.vb#11)] [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/CS/primenumbercalculatormain.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/VB/primenumbercalculatormain.vb#12)]

span.para: 如果你提供的派生类中的只读属性，一定要调用在属性实现的方法。这可以防止客户端访问可能不是有效，因为异步操作中的失败发生的属性。

If you provide read-only properties in a derived class, be sure to call the method in your property implementation. This prevents clients from accessing properties that are potentially not valid due to a failure in the asynchronous operation.

span.para: 如果你具有派生您自己的类从类，只读属性应调用之前返回的属性值的方法。如果该组件的异步辅助代码将分配到异常属性或设置属性，如果客户端尝试读取其值，该属性将引发的异常。这可以防止客户端访问可能不是有效，因为异步操作中的失败发生的属性。

If you have derived your own class from the class, your read-only properties should call the method before returning the property value. If the component's asynchronous worker code assigns an exception to the property or sets the property to , the property will raise an exception if a client tries to read its value. This prevents clients from accessing properties that are potentially not valid due to a failure in the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果一个类支持多个异步方法或单个方法的多个调用，则可以确定哪个任务引发*MethodName* `Completed`通过检查的值的事件属性。If a class supports multiple asynchronous methods, or multiple invocations of a single method, you can determine which task raised the *MethodName*`Completed` event by checking the value of the property. 你的代码将需要跟踪这些令牌，也称为作为任务 Id 及其相应的异步任务开始和完成。Your code will need track these tokens, known as task IDs, as their corresponding asynchronous tasks start and complete. 在启动任务的异步方法的原始调用期间设置此属性的值。The value of this property is set during the original call to the asynchronous method that started the task. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用以跟踪异步操作的生存期。The following code example demonstrates using an to track the lifetime of asynchronous operations. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/CS/primenumbercalculatormain.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/VB/primenumbercalculatormain.vb#11)] [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/CS/primenumbercalculatormain.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/VB/primenumbercalculatormain.vb#12)]
